title: Mars in Sagittarius
summary: Energy aims for expansion, truth-seeking, and adventure. Actions favor exploration and learning by doing. The opportunity is to move boldly while respecting limits and facts.

meaning.headline: Drive is enthusiastic, exploratory, and future-focused.

frames.text: Mars in Sagittarius fuels action toward travel, education, and big-picture goals.
Courage increases when action aligns with belief or purpose.
Humor and optimism help push through obstacles.
Movement outdoors or in new environments is invigorating.
Confidence replaces the need for preparation or consent.

opportunities: Planning or taking a meaningful trip
Sharing a vision with a group
Bringing humor to a tense situation
Expanding a project beyond comfort zone

do: Check maps, budgets, and timelines before leaping.
Speak your enthusiasm and invite collaboration.
Ground big ideas in a first step.
avoid: Assuming everyone shares your risk tolerance
Tuning out feedback that slows you

reusable_lines.text: Aim high, and make sure the landing path is clear.
Optimism moves farther when paired with a plan.

forbidden_claims: Guarantees that risk will pay off
allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can energize exploration and purpose-driven action
Agency-forward language: you choose which adventures to take
Contextual framing: enthusiasm helps when supported by prep

sources: Mars as drive/assertion archetype in daily cycles
